page.title: 13PEOPLE
page.content: Our block is mainly open country and there is a paucity of people which probably means that information gathered is not truly representative of a larger sample. However within the area the{population}is very mixed representing three (from village, council estate and executive housing) quite distinct social strata of society.The average size of{family is about 2.8 children per couple.There are a few cases of single parent families but more cases of split {marriages.}There is certainly evidence that the people are living to a greater age and it was pleasing that of those questioned (Roseworth) about 15% of homes had grandma or grandad living with son or daughter. Children have a caring attitude to the{elderly and in many cases give tangible assistance.
